mapper.select: SELECT fe.employ_id AS employId, fe.employ_no AS employNo, fe.employ_name AS employName, fe.room_no AS roomNo, (SELECT department_name FROM t_f_department d WHERE 1=1 AND d.department_no=fe.department_no) AS departmentName, fe.area_no AS areaNo, fe.secret_key AS secretKey, fe.card_no AS cardNo, fe.id_card_no AS idCardNo, fe.sex,fe.photo AS photo,fe.photo_state AS photoState, fe.telephone,fe.nation,fe.birth_place AS birthPlace, fe.property_no AS propertyNo, fe.begin_datetime AS beginDatetime, fe.end_datetime AS endDatetime, fp.property_name AS propertyName, fe.is_submarine_back AS isSubmarineBack, fe.is_present AS isPresent, fe.is_down AS isDown, fe.create_by AS createBy, fe.create_time AS createTime, fe.update_by AS updateBy, fe.update_time AS updateTime FROM t_f_employ_info fe,t_f_property fp WHERE fp.property_no=fe.property_no and fe.department_no=#{dTempNo}
